text: is a Japanese professional baseball pitcher for the Yomiuri Giants of Nippon Professional Baseball (NPB). On November 16, 2018, he was selected Yomiuri Giants roster at the 2018 MLB Japan All-Star Series exhibition game against MLB All-Stars. On February 27, 2019, he was selected for Japan national baseball team at the 2019 exhibition games against Mexico. On October 1, 2019, he was selected at the 2019 WBSC Premier12. ==References== ==External links== * NPB.com Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Nippon Professional Baseball pitchers Category:Baseball people from Hiroshima Prefecture Category:Yomiuri Giants players Category:2019 WBSC Premier12 players
title: Kazuto Taguchi
